author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: بین المقرّبین تشبّث بذیل الله وتمسّک بحبله المتین إیّاک أن یمنعک ضجیج الّذین کفروا بهذا النّبأ العظیم بلّغ ما أمرت به في اللّوح ولو یعترض علیک العباد إنّ ربّک لهو القويّ الحفیظ والبهآء
translation: Cling thou to the hem of the Robe of God, and take thou firm hold on His Cord, a Cord which none can sever. Beware that the clamor of them that have repudiated this Most Great Announcement shall not deter thee from achieving thy purpose. Proclaim what hath been prescribed unto thee in this Tablet, though all the peoples arise and oppose thee. Thy Lord is, verily, the All-Compelling, the Unfailing Protector.
